name: Xiangli Yao
nickname: Error detected. If you have any questions, please contact Customer Service.

talent.name: Matter Weaver
talent.description:
Evaluation Basis: [Resonance Assessment 2603-G]

Resonator Xiangli Yao's awakening occurred two years ago, following an incident at the Jingtian Ruins where he lost his arm and came into contact with an unknown metal substance.

Resonator Xiangli Yao's Tacet Mark is located on his prosthetic right arm. Post-Awakening observations revealed his ability to perform Metalmorph by manipulating the shape and stored energy of his prosthetic arm.

The Resonance Spectrum Pattern of Xiangli Yao has been observed to align closely with that of thunder. A strong Syntony reaction has been observed, yet the cause of Xiangli Yao's Awakening remains unclear due to inability to recover samples of the unknown metal substance.  

Analysis of test samples has revealed a consistent, flat Rabelle's Curve followed by a sharp ascent and stabilization. Therefore, Xiangli Yao is identified as a Mutant Resonator.

combo_teaching.title: Xiangli Yao: <color=#d4bf5f>Basic Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Perform up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Xiangli Yao: <color=#d4bf5f>Mid-air Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Consume STA to perform a Plunging Attack from mid-air, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Xiangli Yao: <color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Consume STA to perform a Heavy Attack on the target, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Xiangli Yao: <color=#d4bf5f>Chain Resonance Skill</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: When the Forte Gauge is full, you can cast the <color=Highlight>Chain Resonance Skill</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Xiangli Yao: <color=#d4bf5f>Chain Resonance Skill</color> in Resonance Liberation State Tutorial
combo_teaching.description:
After casting <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation</color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> restores the Forte Gauge on hit.
When the Forte Guage is full, you can cast the <color=Highlight>Chain Resonance Skill</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Xiangli Yao: <color=#d4bf5f>Chain Resonance Skill</color> in Resonance Liberation State Tutorial
combo_teaching.description:
After casting <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation</color>, <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> restores the Forte Gauge on hit.
When the Forte Guage is full, you can cast the <color=Highlight>Chain Resonance Skill</color>.
